name: Manaflow
headline: Build internal tools for AI using natural language
description:
Manaflow enables businesses to build and automate internal tool workflows involving data, APIs, and actions with AI agents using natural language. 

Manaflow replaces the boring, manual internal tools of the past with a new paradigm of internal tools built for and operated by AI agents instead of human operations teams. Let AI agents tackle repetitive research tasks, data consolidation, analytical reports, and database actions while you focus on the bigger picture for your company. Stop wasting engineering resources on boring internal tools that require even more human resources to operate them.

founders.name: Austin Wang, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO of Manaflow / previously Google, NASA JPL, & Chess.com / Yale Physics / featured on Business Insider & The Economist

founders.name: Lawrence Chen, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Manaflow / prev. Minion AI / Berkeley '24

# Build internal tools for AI using natural language
Automate repetitive internal tool workflows involving data, APIs, and actions.Program AI agents to operate internal tools with natural language.
[Get Started](https://manaflow.com/</sign-up>)[Book a Demo](https://manaflow.com/<https:/cal.com/team/manaflow/meeting>)
[Backed by![Y Combinator](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2FYClogo.211a9f5e.png&w=48&q=75)Y Combinator](https://manaflow.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LPF-manaflow-build-and-manage-your-dream-ai-operations-team/>)
Manaflow works with leading enterprise companies, mid-sized businesses, and startups.
![Howard Hughes](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhoward-hughes.5cbfd328.webp&w=384&q=75)
![Instacoach](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Finstacoach.80b1df4b.png&w=384&q=75)
![RiskAngle](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Friskangle.35a38120.png&w=384&q=75)
![Best Western](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbest-western.6f2fed00.png&w=384&q=75)
# Reimagine the future of internal tools with AI agents
Manaflow revolutionizes how businesses build and operate internal tools. With Manaflow, you can use natural language to build internal tools and program AI agents to operate them. Stop wasting engineering talent on boring internal tools and human teams to manually operate them.
# Threads
Utilize natural language to connect sources of data, program AI agents to take actions involving APIs, and build Manasheets to orchestrate these AI agents in unison.
# Manasheet
A table interface that orchestrates AI agents to execute tasks. Each column represents an AI agent performing a step of a task, and each row represents an instance of the task.
# Panels
Build custom dashboards to manage your business operations. Connect your database or Manasheets and begin cultivating queries and charts for your panel using natural language.
# Solve your business pain points with automation
We have a list of most commonly used Manaflow templates in operations, sales, & research that you can start using today. Our library has a collection of Manasheets that you can choose from for your own use.
[![Tagging Consumer Interviews](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fconsumer-tag.d3cd661e.png&w=2048&q=75)SalesTagging Consumer InterviewsTag customer interviews with different categories and quotations with AI](https://manaflow.com/</templates/tagging-consumer-interviews>)
[![Template Gallery](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flibrary.a333fff2.png&w=2048&q=75)GalleryTemplate GalleryFind more templates in our gallery to automate the workflows of your choice](https://manaflow.com/</templates>)
[![Invoice PDF Extractor](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Finvoice-pdf.65942767.png&w=2048&q=75)SalesInvoice PDF ExtractorExtract data from invoice PDFs into a structured table format](https://manaflow.com/</templates/invoice-pdf-extractor>)
# Drive live impact with Manaflow in your business
We have a playlist of Manaflow driving live impact in action. Learn how to build workflows on Manaflow and program AI agents to operate internal tools for your business.
Agent: Add daily company news articles and summarize them
Manasheet: Extract product prices and compare with competitors
# Scale your business with the AI revolution today.
[Get Started](https://manaflow.com/</sign-up>)[Talk to Sales](https://manaflow.com/<https:/cal.com/team/manaflow/meeting>)
![Manaflow.com Logo](https://manaflow.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fmanaflow.7c2c501f.png&w=64&q=75)

generated_description:
**Manaflow: Revolutionizing Internal Tools with AI**

Founded in 2024 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Manaflow is redefining how businesses interact with their internal processes by harnessing the power of AI and natural language processing. Recognized as part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, the company is on a mission to eliminate the tediousness of traditional internal tools and replace them with intelligent, automated workflows operated by AI agents.

At its core, Manaflow allows organizations to **build and automate internal workflows using natural language**, making it easier than ever to connect data, APIs, and actions. This means that businesses can delegate repetitive tasks like data analysis, report generation, and database management to AI agents. Instead of burdening engineering teams with monotonous tool operations, Manaflow lets them prioritize strategic initiatives while AI handles the drudgery.

### What Makes Manaflow Stand Out?

1. **Natural Language Processing**: Users can interact with their internal tools in a conversational manner. This reduces the learning curve and improves efficiency.
   
2. **Automated Workflows**: By organizing tasks through a feature called **Manasheets**, Manaflow allows teams to orchestrate multiple AI agents to execute complex operations seamlessly.

3. **Custom Dashboards**: With **Panels**, businesses can create tailored dashboards that visualize key operations data, driven by AI-generated insights.

4. **Template Library**: For immediate implementation, Manaflow offers a rich collection of templates for various operations, sales, and research tasks, enabling users to kickstart their automation efforts quickly.

Manaflow's approach not only helps companies streamline their operations but also frees up human resources to tackle more strategic challenges. The aim here is clear: innovate internal processes to drive efficiency and foster growth in an age where AI is becoming an indispensable tool in the business landscape.

Based with a small but mighty team of three, Manaflow is already working with a spectrum of clients ranging from startups to established enterprises, showcasing the flexible utility of their platform in varied business contexts. Backed by notable figures in the startup ecosystem, like group partner Dalton Caldwell at Y Combinator, Manaflow is poised to make a significant impact.

In a nutshell, Manaflow is inviting businesses to **reimagine their internal operations** and embrace the AI revolution. If you're tired of traditional internal tools and want to elevate your workflows, it's time to explore what Manaflow has to offer. 

For more information, check out their website: [Manaflow.com](https://manaflow.com).
